original_text: And wheresoever he taketh him, he teareth him: and he foameth, and gnasheth with his teeth, and pineth away: and I spake to thy disciples that they should cast him out; and they could not.
korean_text: 귀신이 어디서든지 그를 잡으면 거꾸러져 거품을 흘리며 이를 갈며 그리고 파리해지는지라 내가 선생님의 제자들에게 내쫓아 달라 하였으나 그들이 능히 하지 못하더이다

sentences.original_text: And wheresoever he taketh him, he teareth him:
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 그를 데려가는 곳마다, 그는 그를 찢어 놓고

sentences.original_text: and he foameth, and gnasheth with his teeth,
and I spake to thy disciples
that they should cast him out;
